Name: Cursed Angel: Time Paradox
About the game: In 2028, a programmer creates the Mask of Time. Anyone wearing the Mask of Time can control time and space in the universe. The programmer, who calls himself Cursed Angel, uses the mask to travel back to Atlantis City in 200 B.C. KEY FEATURES Become a super hero, dragon or command legendary legions to kill demons Use the Mask Of Time to freeze time or travel through time. 70+ heroes and legions to unlock. More than 100 choices to decide your fate. Find a genie to grant you a wish. Open world with procedurally-generated content, as well as 9 legend castles to discover and conquer. Raid, capture, and upgrade castles. Hundreds of skills and items to unlock. Many side things to do: fishing, finding treasure, dancing, flirting, training weapons and magic...
